property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may draw a card. Dragsolution: When you draw a card, if its the fifth card you drew that turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put one of them on top of your deck and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then you may draw a card. Your water Dragons can't be blocked. Double breaker Dragon Evade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Mana Arms 9: When this creature attacks, if you have 9 or more fire cards in your mana zone, untap it, and it gets +3000 power until the end of the turn. When your opponent chooses this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power equal to or less than it. Double breaker

card.name: La Rose Blouet, Blue Flower Dragon Elemental

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Double breaker Whenever one of your Dragons attacks or blocks, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. This creature cant be chosen by non light spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks you, you may cast a spell that has 'shield trigger' from your hand for no cost. Mana Arms 7: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, if you have 7 or more water cards in your mana zone, you may cast it from your graveyard for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature in battle zone or when it attacks, you may return a darkness creature from your graveyard to hand. If you do,destroy one of your opponent's creatures. When this creature leaves the battle zone,if you have no other creatures in battle zone,you may discard 2 creatures from your hand instead. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex evolution—Put on 2 of your Dragons. Whenever this creature attacks, destroy up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that have less power than it. Triple breaker

card.name: Domitius, Evil Emperor of Five Dragonskind

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may choose a light creature, water creature, darkness creature, fire creature and nature creature that costs 7 or less and put them into the battle zone. Then, put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When this creature or another of your creatures is destroyed, you look at the top 2 cards of your deck. From among them, you may put a non-evolution creature that costs 3 or less into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent draws a card, you may draw 2 cards. When you would draw the last card of your deck, put any number of spells from your graveyard on the top of your deck in any order instead, then draw a card. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your opponent's turn, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature must attack this turn if able. When one of your opponent's creatures attack, if it's the first attack that turn, you may put a Funky Knightmare from your hand that costs 6 or less in battle zone. If you do, destroy it at the end of the turn. Double breaker

card.name: Tenshukaku, Dragon King Keep ~Fighting Spirit Mode~

property.name: Rules
property.value: When one of your fire creatures battles, it gets +2000 power until the end of the turn. Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures battles, that creature gets +2000 power until the end of the turn. During your turn, whenever one of your creatures is blocked for the first time, untap that creature. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have another Dragon in the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If you don't have another Dragon in the battle zone, put this creature into your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your light Dragons. Double breaker While this creature is tapped, your opponent's creatures in the battle zone don't untap at the start of his turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can't choose this one. (However, it can still be attacked or blocked.) Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'blocker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your Light creatures in the battle zone gets +1000 power. Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more Light creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +1000 power. At the end of each of your turns, untap all your creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a water dragheart that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or less in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card. If it's a water spell, you may show it to your opponent and untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more water cards in your mana zone, you may have the first spell you cast each turn cost 3 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may summon this creature by destroying 3 of your creatures instead of paying its cost. Whenever this creature attacks, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: At the end of each of your turns, if you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, your opponent chooses a card in his hand and discards the rest.

card.name: Demon Wolf, Soul Eating Moonlight Castle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your Darkness creatures in the battle zone gets 'slayer'. Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more Darkness creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'slayer'. At the start of your opponent's turn, your opponent chooses one of his creatures that can attack. That creature must attack that turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature battles with this creature. Whenever this creature wins a battle, this creature gets +2000 power and 'double breaker' until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can't be blocked by creatures that have less power than it. Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more nature cards in your mana zone, this creature gets +7000 power and 'double breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your nature creatures may cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more Nature creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your creatures may cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose a nature creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever you put a dragheart into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.
